properties.name: spring.jackson.joda-date-time-format
properties.description: Joda date time format string. If not configured, "date-format" is used as a fallback if it is configured with a format string.

properties.name: spring.jackson.read
properties.description: Jackson on/off token reader features that are specific to JSON.

properties.name: spring.jackson.write
properties.description: Jackson on/off token writer features that are specific to JSON.
